artist: Author: Avant-propos by Albert Gleizes; Author: Epilogue by Jean Metzinger; after Georges Braque; after André Derain; Marcel Duchamp; Albert Gleizes; after Juan Gris; Marie Laurencin; after Fernand Léger; Jean Metzinger; Francis Picabia; Pablo Picasso; Jacques Villon; Printer: Compagnie Française des Arts Graphiques, Paris; Publisher: Compagnie Française des Arts Graphiques, Paris
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
life_date: Avant-propos by Albert Gleizes, Author, French, 1881–1953; Epilogue by Jean Metzinger, Author, French, 1883–1956; after Georges Braque, French, 1882–1963; after André Derain, French, 1880–1954; Marcel Duchamp, American (born France), 1887–1968; Albert Gleizes, French, 1881–1953; after Juan Gris, Spanish, 1887–1927; Marie Laurencin, French, 1885–1956; after Fernand Léger, French, 1881–1955; Jean Metzinger, French, 1883–1956; Francis Picabia, French, 1879–1953; Pablo Picasso, Spanish (active France), 1881–1973; Jacques Villon, French, 1875–1963; Compagnie Française des Arts Graphiques, Paris, Printer; Compagnie Française des Arts Graphiques, Paris, Publisher
medium: Illustrated book with etchings, drypoints, aquatints, photogravures, and letterpress, pages loose as issued
provenance: Joseph E. Dietzgen, Cotuit, Mass.; Estate of Joseph Dietzgen, by descent to Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2017.
title: Du Cubisme
